00024   SingleCellAnalysis::SingleCellAnalysis() : Processor("SingleCellAnalysis")
00025   {
00026 
00027     _description = "Processor that collects cellwise informaion" ;
00028 
00029     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00030                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides the geometry of the detector." ,
00031                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00032                                 std::string("MyMappingProcessor") ) ;
00033 
00034     registerProcessorParameter( "Hist_ESum_xbins" ,
00035                                 "Energy sum histogram: number of bins in x-axis",
00036                                 _Hist_ESum_xbins,
00037                                 int( 100 ) ) ;
00038 
00039     registerProcessorParameter( "Hist_ESum_xmin" ,
00040                                 "Energy sum histogram: lower limit on x-axis",
00041                                 _Hist_ESum_xmin,
00042                                 float( -505 ) ) ;
00043 
00044     registerProcessorParameter( "Hist_ESum_xmax" ,
00045                                 "Energy sum histogram: upper limit on x-axis",
00046                                 _Hist_ESum_xmax,
00047                                 float( 505 ) ) ;
00048 
00049     registerInputCollection( LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT ,
00050                              "AHCALcollection" ,
00051                              "Name of the AHCAL Hit collection" ,
00052                              _ahcalColName ,
00053                              std::string("AhcCalorimeter_Hits"));
00054 
00055     registerProcessorParameter( "OutputFile_txt" ,
00056                                 "Name of the .txt output file" ,
00057                                 _txtOutputName,
00058                                 std::string("SingleCellAnalysis_output.txt") ) ;
00059 
00060     registerProcessorParameter( "OutputFile_root" ,
00061                                 "Name of the .root output file containing one histogram per cell" ,
00062                                 _rootOutputName,
00063                                 std::string("SingleCellAnalysis_output.root") ) ;
00064 
00065     _nEvents = 0;
00066 
00067     _cellStat = NULL;
00068     _cellHist = NULL;
00069 
00070   }

00078   SingleCellAnalysis::~SingleCellAnalysis()
00079   {
00080     if (_cellStat) delete _cellStat;
00081     if (_cellHist) delete _cellHist;
00082   }

00086   /*                                                                                     */

00089   /***************************************************************************************/
00090   void SingleCellAnalysis::init()
00091   {
00092     printParameters();
00093 
00094     std::stringstream message;
00095     bool error = false;
00096 
00097     _mapper = (AhcMapper*)MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName);
00098 
00099     if ( ! _mapper )
00100       {
00101         message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName << ") did not return a valid mapper." << std::endl;
00102         error = true;
00103       }
00104 
00105     if (error) {
00106       streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00107       throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00108     }
00109 
00110     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00111 
00112     _cellStat = new MappedContainer<SingleCellStatistics>(_mapper);
00113     _cellHist = new MappedContainer<TH1F>(_mapper);
00114 
00115   }
00116 
00117 
00118   /***************************************************************************************/
00119   /*                                                                                     */
00120   /*                                                                                     */
00121   /*                                                                                     */
00122   /***************************************************************************************/
00123   void SingleCellAnalysis::updateMapping()
00124   {
00125     /*clear all objects in the container*/
00126     _cellStat->clear();
00127 
00128     _nEvents = 0;
00129 
00130     /*
00131      * initialise the container with 0 for all valid cellIDs
00132      */
00133     for ( CellIterator iter = _mapper->begin(); iter != _mapper->end(); ++iter)
00134       {
00135         int cellID = *iter;
00136 
00137         SingleCellStatistics* cellStat = new SingleCellStatistics();
00138         _cellStat->fillByCellID( cellID, cellStat );
00139 
00140         int module = _mapper->getModuleFromCellID( *iter );
00141         int chip = _mapper->getChipFromCellID( *iter );
00142         int channel = _mapper->getChanFromCellID( *iter );
00143 
00144         std::stringstream ss_histName;
00145         ss_histName << "mod_" << module << "_chip_" << chip << "_chan_" << channel;
00146         std::string histName = ss_histName.str();
00147         TH1F* cellHist = NULL;
00148 
00149         cellHist = new TH1F( histName.c_str(), histName.c_str(), _Hist_ESum_xbins, _Hist_ESum_xmin, _Hist_ESum_xmax );
00150         cellHist->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("signal");
00151         cellHist->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("# entries");
00152 
00153         if ( cellHist == NULL )throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00154 
00155         _cellHist->fillByCellID( cellID, cellHist );
00156 
00157       }
00158 
00159   }
00160

00162   /***************************************************************************************/
00163   /*                                                                                     */
00164   /*                                                                                     */
00165   /*                                                                                     */
00166   /***************************************************************************************/
00167   void SingleCellAnalysis::processEvent( LCEvent *evt )
00168   {
00169     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n EVENT: "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<std::endl;
00170 
00171     if (_mapperVersion != _mapper->getVersion()) this->updateMapping();
00172     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00173 
00174     _nEvents++;
00175 
00176     if (_nEvents % 10000 == 0)
00177       streamlog_out(MESSAGE) << "EventNr: " << _nEvents << std::endl;
00178 
00179     try {
00180       evt->getCollection( _ahcalColName );
00181 
00182       LCCollection* ahcCol = evt->getCollection( _ahcalColName );
00183 
00184       LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit> ahcHits( ahcCol );
00185       LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit>::iterator ahcHitIt;
00186 
00187       for ( ahcHitIt=ahcHits.begin(); ahcHitIt != ahcHits.end(); ahcHitIt++ ) {
00188 
00189         int cellID = (*ahcHitIt)->getCellID0();
00190 
00191         ( _cellStat->getByCellID( cellID ) )->add_hit( (*ahcHitIt)->getEnergy() );
00192         ( _cellHist->getByCellID( cellID ) )->Fill( (*ahcHitIt)->getEnergy() );
00193 
00194       }
00195 
00196     } catch (DataNotAvailableException& e) {
00197       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "collection not in event : " << e.what()<< std::endl;
00198       return;
00199     }
00200 
00201   }
00202

00204   /***************************************************************************************/
00205   /*                                                                                     */
00206   /*                                                                                     */
00207   /*                                                                                     */
00208   /***************************************************************************************/
00209   void SingleCellAnalysis::end()
00210   {
00211 
00212     //std::ofstream fout_txt( _txtOutputName.c_str(), ios::app );
00213     std::ofstream fout_txt( _txtOutputName.c_str() );
00214     fout_txt << "mod/I" << ":"
00215              << "chip/I" << ":"
00216              << "chan/I" << ":"
00217              << "nEvents/I" << ":"
00218              << "nHits/I" << ":"
00219              << "ESum_mean/F" << ":"
00220              << "ESum_rms/F" << ":"
00221              << "ESum_total/F" << ":"
00222              << "hit_energy_max/F" << std::endl;
00223 
00224     TFile *fout_root = new TFile( _rootOutputName.c_str(), "RECREATE" );
00225 
00226     /*
00227      * Check energy and hits in each cell
00228      */
00229     for ( CellIterator iter = _mapper->begin(); iter != _mapper->end(); ++iter)
00230       {
00231         int cellID = *iter;
00232 
00233         int mod = _mapper->getModuleFromCellID( *iter );
00234         int chip = _mapper->getChipFromCellID( *iter );
00235         int chan = _mapper->getChanFromCellID( *iter );
00236 
00237         if ( _nEvents > 0 ) {
00238 
00239           SingleCellStatistics* cellStat = _cellStat->removeByCellID( cellID );
00240 
00241           int nHits = cellStat->get_n_hits();
00242           double ESum_total = cellStat->get_energy_sum();
00243           double ESum_mean = cellStat->get_energy_mean();
00244           double ESum_rms = cellStat->get_energy_rms();
00245           double hit_energy_max = cellStat->get_hit_energy_max();
00246           // double nHits_ratio = (double)nHits / (double)_nEvents;
00247 
00248           fout_txt << mod << " "
00249                    << chip << " "
00250                    << chan << " "
00251                    << _nEvents << " "
00252                    << nHits << " "
00253                    << ESum_mean << " "
00254                    << ESum_rms << " "
00255                    << ESum_total << " "
00256                    << hit_energy_max << std::endl;
00257 
00258         }
00259         else {
00260 
00261           fout_txt << mod << " "
00262                    << chip << " "
00263                    << chan  << " "
00264                    << _nEvents << " "
00265                    << 0 << " "
00266                    << 0 << " "
00267                    << 0 << " "
00268                    << 0 << " "
00269                    << 0 << std::endl;
00270 
00271         }
00272 
00273         ( _cellHist->removeByCellID( cellID ) )->Write();
00274 
00275       }
00276 
00277     delete _cellStat;
00278     delete _cellHist;
00279 
00280     fout_root->Close();
00281 
00282   }
00283

00285   /***************************************************************************************
00286    * create instance to make processor known to Marlin
00287    * should be very last thing to do, to prevent order problems during
00288    * deletion of static objects.
00289    ***************************************************************************************/
00290   SingleCellAnalysis aSingleCellAnalysis;
